lessons.title: Home Row Keys

steps.description: Welcome to the Home Row Keys lesson! In this lesson, you'll learn the foundation of touch typing by mastering the home row keys: A, S, D, F, J, K, L, and semicolon. Place your fingers on these keys and get ready to start your typing journey.
Type the home row keys in sequence
